com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport

Class TextRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport.TextRange

  • public final class TextRange
extends Object
    A description of part of the String in an Excerpt.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextRange(int offset, TextRangeType type)
      Constructs a new TextRange, initializing all mandatory fields.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLength()
      Gets the length of this TextRange.
      int getOffset()
      Gets the zero-based offset of this TextRange within the Excerpt.
      TextRangeType getType()
      Gets the TextRangeType of this TextRange.
      void setLength(int length)
      Sets the length of this TextRange to the specified value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextRange

        public TextRange(int offset,
         TextRangeType type)
        Constructs a new TextRange, initializing all mandatory fields.
        Parameters:
        offset - The zero-based offset of a match or an ellipsis within the Excerpt.
        type - The TextRangeType of the identified part of the Excerpt.

    • Method Detail

      • getOffset

        public int getOffset()
        Gets the zero-based offset of this TextRange within the Excerpt.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        Gets the length of this TextRange.
        Returns:
        See above, or zero if getType() returns TextRangeType.ELISION.

      • setLength

        public void setLength(int length)
        Sets the length of this TextRange to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        length - The value to set, which must be zero if getType() returns TextRangeType.ELISION.

      • getType

        public TextRangeType getType()
        Gets the TextRangeType of this TextRange.
        Returns:
        See above.
